name: 宋裕祺
objective: 本程主要教授學生熟悉：(1)結構之穩定與靜定性、(2)靜定結構之分析、(3)梁之剪力、彎矩圖、(4)影響線與移動力、(5)結構之彈性變形、(6)靜不定結構分析─諧合變位法。
schedule:
Week 1   Introduction
Week 2  Determination of the instable structure, static determined structure and statically indeterminate structure (1)
Week 3 Determination of the instable structure, static determined structure and statically indeterminate structure (2)
Week 4  Analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of beam
Week 5  Analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of arch
Week 6  Analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of rigid frame
Week 7  Analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of truss (1)
Week 8  Analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of truss (2)
Week 9  Virtual work on structural analysis
Week 10 Influence line analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of beam and frame
Week 11 Influence line analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of arch
Week 12 Influence line analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of truss (1)
Week 13 Influence line analysis of the statically indeterminate structure of truss (2)
Week 14 Conjugated-beam method on determination of deformation of the structure
Two weeks are used for the mid-term and the final.
scorePolicy:
Midterm Examination (35%)
Final Examination (40%)
Homework (15%)
Quiz (10%)
materials: Handout of “Structural Analysis”, by Dr. Yu-Chi, Sung
